H0.text: Referring to the cause of a person's downfall, who is the Greek goddess of punishment. Adrestia

H1.text: Referring to the cause of a person's downfall, who is the Greek goddess of punishment. Erinyes

H2.text: Referring to the cause of a person's downfall, who is the Greek goddess of punishment. Dike

H3.text: Referring to the cause of a person's downfall, who is the Greek goddess of punishment. Nemesis

A4.text: The Erinyes are chthonic goddesses of vengeance in ancient Greek religion and mythology.

A5.text: Because of this, he is pursued and tormented by the terrible Erinyes, who demand yet further blood vengeance.
